mapper.select: select member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_phone as memberPhone, member_type as memberType, member_email as memberEmail from member where member_id = #{_parameter}

select member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_phone as memberPhone, member_type as memberType, member_email as memberEmail from member where member_id = #{memberId} and member_pw = #{memberPw}

select owner_no as ownerNo, owner_id as ownerId, owner_pw as ownerPw, owner_name as ownerName, onwer_phone as ownerPhone, owner_email as ownerEamil, owner_type as ownerType, Business_license_no as businessLicenseNo from owner where owner_id = #{_parameter}
